name: raml2mz
description: Generate a Typescript API client from RAML

scripts.generate: node bin/raml-javascript-generator.js test/support/fixtures/example.raml -o test/.tmp/example && cd test/.tmp/example && npm install
scripts.test-spec: npm run test-server-open && node test/specs/*.js; npm run test-server-close
scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover --print none blue-tape -- test/specs/*.js | tap-dot
scripts.test-browser: browserify -i nock -t envify ./test/support/globals.js test/specs/*.js | tape-run | tap-dot
scripts.test-server-close: if [ -f test.pid ]; then kill -9 $(cat test.pid); rm test.pid; fi
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run generate && npm run test-server-open && npm run test-cov && npm run test-browser; npm run test-server-close

author: MuleSoft, Inc., Agustin Mendez (@menduz)
